T13n2940u_001:2: paśyantyanāviladṛśaḥ savikāśa muccai- stasmai namaskṛtiriyaṁ gurubhāskarāya || 1 ||
T13n2940u_001:4: śrīmadratnatrayākhyaṁ maha-atisukhadaṁ sarvabhūtāśrayaṁ tad yad dāridryāndhakāraṁ kṣapayati viduṣāṁ sundarānandarūpam |
T13n2940u_001:5: jīyāttatkṣoṇipṛṣṭhe śatamiha śaradāṁ sarvadikṣu prasarpa- jjyotiḥ śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇakulajaladhau jātamacchidvṛttam || 2 ||
T13n2940u_001:7: (1) indrātprabhutvaṁ jvalanātpratāpaṁ kopaṁ yamād vaiśravaṇācca vittam |
T13n2940u_001:14: tasyaikā mahiṣī nṛpasya śayane suṣvāpa saukhyaṁ yathā sā svapne ravimaṇḍalaṁ grasitavatyasmīti bhartre'bravīt || 5 ||
T13n2940u_001:16: (2) svāpodbodhitadoṣaroṣakupitavyājena saṁśāsitā sāpatnyādasahiṣṇuneva rajanīṁ vyākrośatī vyatyagāt |
T13n2940u_001:17: garbhajyeṣṭhamudasya sāśu suṣuve śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇaṁ māsaiḥ saptabhirākhyayā samaguṇaṁ pratyakṣanārāyaṇam || 6 ||
T13n2940u_001:19: (3) nepālaṁ vijigīṣurekagabalaṁ mudrābhirāpūritaṁ tūṇīkṛtya mṛgaṁ yathaiva mṛgayurnirbhīḥ pratasthe mudā |
T13n2940u_001:20: ityevaṁ śrutamanyatastadiha me sakṣipya saṁvarṇitaṁ kiṁ nārāyaṇavarṇane trapayate yāthātmyasapādakaḥ || 7 ||
T13n2940u_001:28: paryantabhūkharvaṭa kāṁśca jitvā tāneva kṛtvā ṛjumārgadeśinaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:29: senāniveśānupakalpya viṣṇu- matyāḥ pratīre saritāṁ varāyāḥ || 10 ||
T13n2940u_001:43: śyenā ulūkā atha kākagṛdhradhvāṁkṣāḥ śṛgālā atha pheravaśca |
T13n2940u_001:44: hṛṣṭāśca tuṣṭāśca bhavanti sadyo māṁsoṣṇaraktaiśca vasāvimiśraiḥ || 15 ||
T13n2940u_001:47: prāṇān, prastārasādbhavantyanudinaṁ saṁpīḍitāḥ prastarai- rgāṅgeyasya śareṇa pīḍitatanuḥ seneva yaudhiṣṭhirī || 16 ||
T13n2940u_001:49: dṛṣṭvaibaṁ pratiyoginīṁ raṇabhavāṁ nīcaiḥ sthitāṁ svāṁ camūṁ saṁsīdanniva vaprabhedanavidhāvastrāṇi śastrāṇyatho |
T13n2940u_001:50: nirmātuṁ cakame dhanāni bahuśaḥ śrīpṛthvīnārāyaṇaḥ kebhyaścid dhanavadbhya utsukatayā tadyuddhasaṁsiddhaye || 17 ||
T13n2940u_001:52: (8) saṁbhūyāmātyavṛndairanujadalajitā kīrtimodena sākaṁ śūraiḥ pārthādisaṁjñairatha ca surapratāpena kīrtipurīṣṭeḥ |
T13n2940u_001:53: śrīdevīghāṭamāplāvya ca sapadi mahāmaṇḍapaṁ saṁviveśa kliṣṭātmā pañcaṣābdāvadhi yudhi balavadyodhṛlopātsudīnaḥ || 18 ||
T13n2940u_001:55: (9) śastrāṇi cāstrāṇi ca kañcukāni vīropayogyāni paraśvadhāṁśca |
T13n2940u_001:56: śastrīḥ śitāḥ kartarikāstathā sphyāṁ- striśaṅku śūlānyatha bhallabāṇān || 19 ||
T13n2940u_001:58: tatrāpaśyadamedhyapuñjajanitaṁ so'ṅguṣṭhamātraṁ kṛmiṁ bhūyobhiśca pipīlikākulaśatairāvāhyamānaṁ haṭhāt |
T13n2940u_001:59: dantādanti pipīlikābhirasakṛddaṣṭaṁ ca ṣaṣṭhāccyutaṁ saṁninyuśca pipīlikāḥ svavivaraṁ yatrāsti tannāyakaḥ || 20 ||
T13n2940u_001:61: (10) tatsādṛśyabalābalaṁ ripukuladhvastyai viciṁtyātmanaḥ śrīmatpṛthvinarāyaṇo nijabalaṁ sabodhayāmāsa ha |
T13n2940u_001:62: kiṭādeva guṇaṁ pragṛhṇatha bhavanto-no kṛmiṁ paśyatha gacchadhvaṁ punareva kīrtipurikāṁ matkīrtisaṁrakṣaṇe || 21 ||
T13n2940u_001:67: pṛthvīnārāyaṇārkaḥ prathamamiha samākramya nepālabhūmā- vāsaptābdāhavena pratikhanitasuruṁgeṇa kīrtiṁ praviṣṭaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:68: śrīmadvyāghre śamuddiśya ca balimadadāttatpurīvāsiloka- cchinnaghrāṇooṣṇamāṁsaiḥ sma jayati narabhūpālajaḥ pūvajiṣṇuḥ || 23 ||
T13n2940u_001:71: śrīvyāghrabhairavamiti praṇidhāya sarve ninyuḥ purrīṁ praṇatipūrvamahotsavena || 24 ||
T13n2940u_001:73: uktaṁ ca udyamaḥ sāhasaṁ dhairyaṁ balaṁ buddhiḥ parākramaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:74: ṣaḍete yasya tiṣṭhanti tasya devo'pi śaṅkate || 25 ||
T13n2940u_001:77: jālmena kenacidiva kṣitijākucāgra- syābādhakasya raghujena sakṛtprajasya || 26 ||
T13n2940u_001:83: viśvāsa ghātakamiveti ca nāsikābhi- śchinnābhirāluṭhitavittadhanena sākam || 28 ||
T13n2940u_001:103: (16) kabandha udajāgarīttadadhunāpi kīrtipurād gaṇeśamupadhāvati pratibhaṭeṣu garjanniva |
T13n2940u_001:118: uktaṁ ca rāmaḥ somaṁ papiryajñe dadirgāścakriradbhutam |
T13n2940u_001:133: uktaṁ ca yatra rājā svayaṁ cauraḥ sasainyaparivārakaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:134: tatrāhaṁ kiṁ kariṣyāmi yatorakṣā tato bhayam || 45 ||
T13n2940u_001:146: (20) kustrī hanti kuṭumbāni kuputreṇa hataṁ kulam |
T13n2940u_001:147: kumantrī hanti rājānaṁ rāṣṭraṁ caureṇa hanyate || 49 ||
T13n2940u_001:149: (21) mallaṁ viśvajitaṁ pramāthya nibhṛtaṁ ṣaṭkānumatyaikalo dārānānayati svakīyabhavanaṁ nāsākṣatiṁ nākarot |
T13n2940u_001:150: ityevaṁ jagatītalaṁ ṣaḍadhīnaṁ tatsṛṣṭisaṁhārasaṁ- sthityā śrīdalamarddanaṁ bubudhire dvairūpyasaṁśāntaye || 50 ||
T13n2940u_001:155: sa hyekaikaṁ nijagrāha praṇidhyarthaṁ sutaṁ nṛpaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:161: caukoṭvātāyanastho vilasati dalamarddannṛpo lokadṛṣṭa- statkāle kālidāsaṁ parivṛtamanugai rājamārgeṣvapaśyat |
T13n2940u_001:162: herambaṁ dakṣahaste paraśumitarake modakaṁ svāṁ ca śuṇḍāṁ bibhrāṇaṁ taṁ nimeṣāvadhi tadanu ca sadanābhyantare soyameva || 54 ||
T13n2940u_001:164: (23) sevitvā katiciddināni nijabhṛtyaḥ pādasaṁvāhakaḥ saṁsuptaṁ nibhṛtaṁ vitarkya sahasā taṁ kālidāsaṁ kudhīḥ tīkṣṇenāsya paraśvadhena śira āsphoṭ yāśu rājājñaye- tyuktvā kāntipurīmagācca nṛpatistuṣṭo dadāvīpsitam || 55 ||
T13n2940u_001:166: (24) śrīrājānamabhidravanti militāste ṣaṭpradhānāstvarā kiṁ tvaṁ rajasi pratyavāyajanakaḥ kārpāsadurbhikṣakṛt |
T13n2940u_001:167: evaṁ cedavatārayāma bhaktāmaiśvaryametat kṣama- svotkairvāśvabhiṣecire narapatiṁ śrītejamallābhidham || 56 ||
T13n2940u_001:169: (25) tatsāhasaṁ likhati pṛthvinarāyaṇeṣu saukaryarājyakaraṇaṁ dalamardanaḥ sma |
T13n2940u_001:170: buddhyā tadāśu praṇidhāya hṛdā suraudhān nepālajān svaviṣayānnṛpatiḥ pratasthe || 57 ||
T13n2940u_001:172: (26) mallo'bhūd vyājahālāhala avanipatiryo jayādiprakāśaḥ prāstīryāśeṣaprāsādataladigutale vairidāhauṣadhāni |
T13n2940u_001:173: gorṣābhūpālasenāparivṛḍhagaṇanākātaraḥ kāṁdiśīkaḥ saṁbhūyāmātyavṛndairadhirajani vililye drutaṁ bhaktapuryām || 58 ||
T13n2940u_001:175: (27) prāsāde tulajālaye digutale rājādhirājeśvarīṁ draṣṭuṁ yāvadupāruhaṁśca muditāḥ pāṁḍetulārāmakāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:176: dagdhāṅgāḥ sahasā tadauṣadhibaladvaiśvānarajvālayā śūrāste yayuravyayaṁ vata sakhe daivī vicitrā gatiḥ || 59 ||
T13n2940u_001:188: yāmale'pi- yaḥ kumārīṁ yajenmantrī sarvaparvasu sarvadā |
T13n2940u_001:189: tenārcitā mahādevī satyaṁ satyaṁ na saṁśayaḥ ||
T13n2940u_001:192: āryaiḥ prājñairdhanāḍhyairbalibhiratha mahāyantramantrauṣadhīnāṁ paryāyajñaiśca ṣaḍbhiḥ parivṛtamaniśaṁ kālidāsapradhānaiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:193: tejomallaṁ hi cāṇūramasuramiva saṁmardayitvā kṣaṇena sākṣānnārāyaṇaśrīrmadhuvipinamiva praviśunmaṇ.....ram || 61 ||
T13n2940u_001:195: (29) bhaktagrāmaṁ jighṛkṣustata avanipatistrīṁstrilokaikanāthān kṛtvā kārodarīyāṁstadanu raṇajitaṁ kāśigaṁ kārayitvā |
T13n2940u_001:196: āryātīrthākṛtāsuṁ nṛpamaparamatho tejamallaṁ vipannaṁ kṣveḍagrastaṁ nirasyan sma jayati nṛpatiḥ pṛthvinārāyaṇākhyaḥ || 62 ||
T13n2940u_001:198: (30) pṛthvīnārāyaṇārke samudayati haṭhātpaścimāśācalendrā- daṣṭāṣṭāṣṭābhirabde gatavati vilayaṁ yānti pūrvācalendrāt |
T13n2940u_001:199: mallakṣoṇīpakhadyotarucaya avanī sā ca nepālasaṁjñā susthā cāste prajānāṁ manasi kutukatālhādatā mallapātāt || 63 ||
T13n2940u_001:205: hārītīratha śītalāmatha mahākālaṁ gaṇeśaṁ kramā- cchrīkṛṣṇaṁ harabhīmasenapramukhān bhūpo mudāpūpujat || 65 ||
T13n2940u_001:207: itthaṁ śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇa avanitalam ātmasātkṛtya diṣṭyā copurgrāmasya pāṇicchidimanukurute smāparādhānurūpām |
T13n2940u_001:208: jitvaivānāhavena kṣitimamumupayāsyannuvākoṭayātrāṁ kaṁsaṁ jitvā ca nārāyaṇa iva mathurāṁ dṛṣṭanepālacaryaḥ || 66 ||
T13n2940u_001:211: lalitapurabhavaṁ hi caityasevo- paratajanaṁ varameva manyate sma || 67 ||
T13n2940u_001:214: (33) na tastadṛgabhūddharātala aśeṣaśilpādivid dvijaṁ sa harivaṁśakaṁ vimalaśilpabuddhyanvitam || 68 ||
T13n2940u_001:216: śilpaṁ śikṣayati sma śilpavidasau nepālajān puṁgavān pāṣāṇasphaṭikāsthidantiradanāyaskāntamṛtsnādikam |
T13n2940u_001:217: vāstūkṛtya bhuvastalaṁ śubhadine śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇo devīghāṭamupākramatpramuditaḥ śrībhairavītuṣṭaye || 69 ||
T13n2940u_001:219: (34) ramye nepāladeśe vijitasuranare pañcapīyūṣamādye yoginyo vajrapūrvā iva varuṇasutā mādakā durvinītāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:222: ramye nepāladeśe nijanijabhavanadvāradeśe niṣaṇṇā jūṭīṁ badhvā kacānāṁ sulalitavadanā bhālasindūraramyāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:223: sīmantinyo navīnāḥ parivṛtakusumāḥ kuñcitāpāṅgabhāg.. bhāṣante baddhahastā sulalitavacasā bhāy masīyā masīyā || 71 ||
T13n2940u_001:228: yaṁ viṣṇuṁ pravadanti vaiṣṇavajanāḥ śaivāḥ śivaṁ śāktikāḥ śaktiṁ,
T13n2940u_001:230: matsyendraṁ munayo vadanti satataṁ lokeśvaraṁ bodhikā anye taṁ karuṇāmayaṁ pratidinaṁ taṁ naumi lokeśvaram || 73 ||
T13n2940u_001:232: (36) ṣaḍarṇairjaptaṁ yaḥ pibiti manujo dīpiniyutaṁ subījaṁ pālāśaṁ bhavati viralaṁ tasya yaralam |
T13n2940u_001:233: aho dhanyaṁ yāmyarkṣa śikhitithiyātrādidi.... sa lokeśo devaḥ pratidinamapāyād... naḥ || 74 ||
T13n2940u_001:235: śīghraṁ cākarṣateti prativadati bhṛśaṁ sārathau tadvidhijñe haihaihaihāhahāhādhvanibhiratha diśaḥ pūritā yatprayāṇe |
T13n2940u_001:236: rajvākarṣodyatānāṁ vadanasamuditairmeghaghoṣairivoccaiḥ so'yaṁ śrilokanātho diśatu suraśiromaṇḍanaṁ maṁgalaṁ vaḥ || 75 ||
T13n2940u_001:238: (37) bhagne yugye'pi nīcaiḥ pratisarati rathāṅge rathe vaktrite vā susthībhūte vimānasthitapuruṣavare sārathau lagnayaṣṭau |
T13n2940u_001:239: gajajjīmūtaghoṣadhvanibhiratha mahāḍiṁḍimairvādyamānaḥ soyaṁ matsyendranātho diśatu suraśiromaṇḍanaṁ maṅgalaṁ vaḥ || 76 ||
T13n2940u_001:241: ityevaṁ lalitodbhavaṁ sukhakaraṁ yatrotsavaṁ saṁsmara- nnakṣāṁkāṣṭaśaronmite makarasaṁkrāntau ca pauṣe kuje |
T13n2940u_001:244: (38) ityaṁ śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇanṛpacaritaṁ yaḥ śṛṇotīha bhaktyā dāridryaṁ tasya dūraṁ nivasati duritaṁ pūrvajaṁ vai kṣiṇoti |
T13n2940u_001:245: (39) sa syādratnatrayāṇāmapi paramasakhaḥ kṣudrarogairvimukto dīrghāyurbhāgyayukto nijakulasukhadaḥ sarvavargairupetaḥ || 78 || ||
T13n2940u_001:249: tajjaḥ śrīmānmahīpaḥ kṣitipatitilakaḥ siṁhapūrvapratāpaḥ pitrājñāpālako yo'khiladharaṇitalaṁ dyotayāmāsa nītyā |
T13n2940u_001:250: maryādāṁ sthāpayitvā karajitavasudho rañjakaḥ paurarītyā reje keherasiṁhābhidhahitasacivo vṛddhapaurānumantā || 79 ||
T13n2940u_001:252: (40) kedārāṇāṁ turīyāṁśakamanujagṛhe śasyarājeḥ prajābhya- statpaścāddosicā auliti caturabhidhāṁ lekhayāmāsa potām |
T13n2940u_001:253: śrīmān siṁhapratāpaḥ sma jayati nṛpatiryadyaśo'dyāpi mūrtaṁ varvatyevaṁ jagatsu triṣu duritaharaṁ svānnapākānudāyi || 80 ||
T13n2940u_001:255: (41) kāmbojaiḥ sonumatyā nṛpatiratha mahotsāhapūrvaṁ prakṛtyā saumyo lālāgurūṇāmanugatacarito raupyamudrānupātāt śrīmān siṁhapratāpaḥ saha bahubhiralaṁ mallarājānuvṛttaṁ mudrāṇāṁ raupyajānāmanucaraṇavidhiṁ kārayāmāsa dhanyaḥ || 81 ||
T13n2940u_001:257: tajjaḥ samrāṭ paśūnāṁ patiriva vijayī śītalāpūtanānāṁ sārddhaikābdāya gīrvāṇayudhanṛpataye sūnave rājyabhāram |
T13n2940u_001:258: datvā svāmītyabhikhyāṁ nṛpatiraṇabahādurasāhaḥ prapede kṣoṇīpeśo na bhūto na bhavati na bhavettatsadṛgghorarūpaḥ || 82 ||
T13n2940u_001:260: (42) bālye bāhādurasyārpitadharaṇībharo nirmamo yo vireje kaumāre vīrayoddhāraka jitavasudhaḥ sārvabhaumo vireje |
T13n2940u_001:261: śrīmadgīrvāṇayuddhārpitadharaṇitalo yauvane yobhireme sārddha putreṇa bhīmārpitadharaṇibharo vārddhake yo vireme || 83 ||
T13n2940u_001:264: mūrttīkṛtyārddhanārīśvaramupari gavākṣe vicitreṣṭikābhiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ śrīkhaṇḍajātairgrahagaṇasahitaṁ dairgapīṭhaṁ nyadhāyi || 84 ||
T13n2940u_001:269: majjāmedovasāntrīsarudhiratarasāhāriṇīnāṁ vimokṣa- prāptyai yogādhirūḍhaṁ śarabhamukhamahābhairavaṁ nātighoram |
T13n2940u_001:270: śrīmatsiṁhapratāpātmaja raṇabahādūrasāhakṣitīśaḥ svārāṭtuṣṭyai sma mīmāṁsati kanakabharaṁ sīdhumāṁsādigṛdhnum || 86 ||
T13n2940u_001:272: (44) mālyābājyābhidhānān vṛṣabhaparivṛḍhān pālayan śrīmahīśo naṁdīsaṁjñān yathaiva pramathaparivṛḍhān śrīmaheśo vireje |
T13n2940u_001:275: vyāghrānṛkṣāṁśca kīśān gajaturagamṛgānnyaṅku gokarṇakhaḍgān sāraṅgāṁścakravākān vakaśikhisaraṭān vartakādīn kapotān |
T13n2940u_001:278: (46) almoḍhāṁ rājadhānīṁ chalabalakalanād bammasāhātsagotrā- nmaryādīkṛtya kāntīpurata anumitiṁ krośayaṣṭiṁ cakhāna |
T13n2940u_001:279: so'yaṁ śrīmān śubhaṁyun patiraṇabahādūrasāhaḥ pratāpī cāturdiśyoktakīrtī raghuriva ca dilīpānvavāyapradīpaḥ || 89 ||
T13n2940u_001:282: yādoratnairivāmbho nidhirabhavadadhṛṣyastathā cādhigamyo- 'tyugraiḥ kāntairdharitrīpatiguṇanikareḥ sevakānāṁ sa rājā || 90 ||
T13n2940u_001:287: (48) hayagrīvākāro nṛpagururabhūcchrīraṇabahā- duro nirvāṇāṁśaḥ kvathitaviṣatailaḥ khalajane |
T13n2940u_001:288: viśiṣṭānāṁ nṛṇāṁ pratidalitadāridryadurita- stadanyūnāṁśenā'jani jagati gīrvāṇanṛpatiḥ || 92 ||
T13n2940u_001:290: yathā dīpāddīpo ghṛtaplutasuvarttīranusaran didīpe tulyārciḥ kṣapayati tamopyaṁdhatamasam |
T13n2940u_001:293: (49) sa vātsalyāllebhe gatavati tṛtīyebdanicaye- 'bhiṣiktaḥ sāmrājyaṁ pitṛraṇabahādūrakaragam |
T13n2940u_001:296: (50) nuvākoṭe nītvainamapi nṛpamārabdhamṛgayā- vihāre gīrvāṇāgrimayudhanṛpaṁ kūṭasacivāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:299: (51) vidhātṛkṣmāpālairvilikhitamasatsacca niyataṁ marau vā merau tatphalati nahi citraṁ svasamaye |
T13n2940u_001:302: samāṁsamīnagokulaṁ sahastraśaḥ sadakṣiṇaṁ sabhūmikaṁ samatyajatsadharmisvīrujāṁ kṣaye |
T13n2940u_001:303: avāhayacca kuñjarāśanacchadeṣu varṇaśaḥ sacatvare sapīṭhake nyapāṭhayacca śāṁtikam || 97 ||
T13n2940u_001:305: (53) śivālaye śavālaye digūtale talejuke nadīṣu saṁgameṣvatho praṇālikāsu kūpake |
T13n2940u_001:308: gaṇeśabhairaveṣvatho sa gopureṣu varṇaśo vyacīkaratsvaśākhayā pratikriyāṁ sarudrikām |
T13n2940u_001:309: sa yogiyoginīgaṇaṁ hyabhojayacca pratyahaṁ nṛpaprasūrujāṁ kṣaye dharādhipeśayogirāṭ || 99 ||
T13n2940u_001:311: dākṣāyyāṇāmapurvaṁ samabhavaduditaṁ dardina khecarānāṁ pāśairyantrālinaddhairbahuvidhibhirupāyairthathā māraṇaṁ syāt |
T13n2940u_001:312: jīvantaṁ cānayiṣyatyatha mama yadi yastasya dāsye yatheṣṭa- mityājñā gṛdhrabandhe samajani nṛpatisvāmināmavyalīkā || 100 ||
T13n2940u_001:314: (54) gṛdhrān dagdhvābhavadatha sukhī svāmirājo mahātmā naitādṛggṛdhrayuddhaṁ śrutiviṣayagataṁ naiva dṛṣṭaṁ kadācit |
T13n2940u_001:315: adyāpyāste jyabhālasthalamiti kathitaṁ sthāpitā tatra vāṇī bhūtāveśācchiśūnāṁ hitakṛtikuśalai rjñānavṛddhairvayasthaiḥ || 101 ||
T13n2940u_001:320: (55) yatra yatra gamitā narayānā- ttatra tatra ha dadhāra sukīrtim |
T13n2940u_001:342: kalaṅkamiva śītagoḥ priyanicolamudbibhrataḥ śaśāma na garīyasī raṇabahādurasyoṣṇatā || 110 ||
T13n2940u_001:344: kimaṅga mayi bandukaprahananāni no dīyase sphuṭatyahaha bandukaḥ śuganalaprataptībhavan |
T13n2940u_001:345: kimarthamidamardalīharipate viḍambena ho priyā mama gatā kutastadanu tatra māṁ prāpaya || 111 ||
T13n2940u_001:353: ekadā śucidine sa samutthaḥ prātareva śakunāni viditvā |
T13n2940u_001:356: (59) kalau lokā duṣṭāḥ prakṛtipratikūlāḥ prakṛtayo hyataḥ śrīviśveśaṁ śaraṇamupayāsye sukṛtaye |
T13n2940u_001:357: purā pṛthvīnārāyaṇa iti pitustātacaraṇaḥ sa gaṅgāmbhaḥsnāyī vidhivadatha viśveśamabhajat || 115 ||
T13n2940u_001:359: (60) sa naipālīṁ bhūmiṁ yadanukṛpayā drāgadhikayā vijityāsmatpitraṁghribhiruditametanmama matam |
T13n2940u_001:360: iti smāran smāran nṛparaṇabahādūra agama- nnṛpāgamyāṁ kāśīṁ kanakavatidevīvyuparamāt || 116 ||
T13n2940u_001:362: gate dūraṁ svāminyanu raṇabahādūranṛpatā- vamarsiṁhāmātyātmajamaṇirasau sānujagaṇaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:363: sa bhīmādyaḥ seno daśarathasutaṁ rāmamiva yaḥ samudvignaḥ saumitrirabhavadatha bharttuḥ sahagatiḥ || 117 ||
T13n2940u_001:365: tato'neke lokāḥ samasukharatāstatparivṛḍhā- stadāsaktā bhaktāḥ parijanaviraktā anuyayuḥ |
T13n2940u_001:366: (61) nuvākoṭādapyāgamayati nṛpaṁ kāntinagarīṁ mahotsāhāraktaḥ sapadi militaḥ kūṭasacivaḥ || 118 ||
T13n2940u_001:368: śrīmadgīrvāṇayuddhaḥ kṣitipatitilakaḥ svāmirāje svatāte kāśīsthe'pyaṁgavarye mahasi viruruce svāmivadrāṣṭradhūrdhṛk |
T13n2940u_001:369: samrāṭ sāmrājyalakṣmyā ghṛtapitṛcaraṇajñopi saddharmiṇībhi- rdevībhiḥ pālyamāno daśaśatabhujavān kārtavīryārjunarddhiḥ || 119 ||
T13n2940u_001:372: yaḥ ṣāṇmāturavacca śaktidhṛgatho yaḥ sarvavargādhipo yo dvaimāturavacchatakratuvadāsāhasradṛggocaraḥ || 120 ||
T13n2940u_001:374: (62) ajayrekhāmātūbhramarakalikākhyātha turakī- mukhāśceṭyo ḍākinya iva madirāmodamukharāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:375: mahārājñīṁ kṛtvā kaṭaharavanāt kāṁtipuragāṁ yathecchaṁ tā dauvārikavidhimakurvannṛpagṛhe || 121 ||
T13n2940u_001:377: (63) śrīrājñyā rājalakṣmyā kaṭaharavipinātprākkramitvāpi yatnād vātsalyātpālyamāno dhavaladalaśaśīvātireje vapuṣmān |
T13n2940u_001:380: svasti śrītātapādāmbujasamadhigame śrīmahārājagīrvā- ṇeśaḥ kṣetrāṇyameyānyadadatha dharādaivatebhyo'tha vidbhyaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:381: ceṭīprāyaṁ ca rāṣṭraṁ janakaraṇabahādūrasāhaṁ vineti smāranasmāran sma vismāpayatica sabalaṁ rājabhāraṁ babhāra || 123 ||
T13n2940u_001:383: (64) uktaṁ ca bhāṣayā- bhārādārle ta bhardā sahi pharadamahā dūniyā sab bhayāmā paścāttāple sabaile aghi garanu pachī eka gol bol bhayāmā
T13n2940u_001:384: kāśīvāsī ta svāmī phiraṅisaṁga milī kyāpa garchan ghaḍarmā bhārāle dāra rāṣī yaka mata nabhayā kyā gatī holi deś-mā || 124 ||
T13n2940u_001:386: khelchan rāt dīna jūvā kati kati vijayā phuktachan kohi runchan niḥśaṁkai bāta hākchan kati ati khuśi chan kohi rāt din dhvariṁchan |
T13n2940u_001:387: kāmkā parphāka parchana di-i pani namilī kohi sandūka bharchan ek-le ekai thiyā sab yakabinu duniyā ḍher-prakārakā rahechan || 125 ||
T13n2940u_001:389: estai sūrtā lidāmā nṛpati raṇabahādūra sāheba kāśī bastā gīrvāṇa rājā pratidivasa baṭoldā bhayā vijña josi |
T13n2940u_001:390: (65) logobhāgo aphāldai bahuvidha upacārle garip dūradeśī brāhmaṇa-lo māna gardai bahuta viṣusa bhai rāja garchan ta kausī || 126 ||
T13n2940u_001:392: snātvā gāṅgembhasi raṇabahādūrasāho nvahaṁyuḥ svarṇāmbhodaḥ pratidinamabhūddinakalpadrurevam |
T13n2940u_001:393: śrīviśveśaṁ prati bahutithaṁ manyamānaḥ svadiṣṭyā śrīmadrājarddhyu pakaraṇado'pūrvanamro nanāma || 127 ||
T13n2940u_001:395: gaṁgāputrairatha ca vibuddhaiḥ stūyamānaḥ samakṣaṁ śrīviśveśo'para iva hayagrīvalabdhāvatāraḥ |
T13n2940u_001:396: śrīmān svāmī prakṛtisubhago duṇḍirājaṁ ca lolā- rkaṁ saṁprakramya japati muhurviśvanāthaṁ śaraṇyam || 128 ||
T13n2940u_001:398: (66) kāśīsthaiścāpi phairaṅgibhirapi ca tadā svāmirājaṁ svapālyaṁ matvā dāsāyamānairbahubhirupapadaiḥ sāntvayadbhiḥ samantāt |
T13n2940u_001:401: vīro'marsihathāpākulamaṇirakhilaṁ taddhi tarkaṇa buddhvā channaprāyaṁ kuśāgrāyitaśubhadhiṣaṇo bhīmasenaḥ kṣaṇena |
T13n2940u_001:402: śrīviśveśaṁ kṣamāpyāsakṛdatikaruṇaṁ yatprasādāgrajāgrat- pratyūhadhvastimārgo nagaramupanināya sma ha svāmirājam || 130 ||
T13n2940u_001:404: sāmadānavidhibhedavidhānairbhīmasena abhitaḥ spaśaśālī kāśikāta abhiniṣkramaṇārthaṁ yogamārgamabhitaḥ sa viveda || 131 ||
T13n2940u_001:409: (67) ambhodhiṁ sthalayan dharaṁ tvadharayan gartaṁ samakṣetrayan kṣudraṁ kaṇṭakitaṁ sthalaṁ kusumayan vegaṁ śarakṣepayan |
T13n2940u_001:410: voḍhaṁ ścāpi vivasvadaśvayadasau śrībhīmasenastvarā ṣaḍ ghastrairvasumuṅa nināya lumaḍīdevīmupa svāminam || 133 ||
T13n2940u_001:412: śrīsvāmī candraṣaṣṭhāṣṭaśaśini niragātkāśikāyāḥ purīṁ svāṁ hṛṣṭo viśveśatuṣṭyā prakṛtibhayavapuḥ kāśijān vādirājān |
T13n2940u_001:413: jitvā haiyaṁgavīnaṁ madhuripuriva taddeśatejaśca hṛtvā gopībhīteriva smāpasarati lumaḍīṁ bhīmasenānumantā || 134 ||
T13n2940u_001:416: śrīḍillīśvavāgvilāsarasikairdāmodarai rjyotiṣai rāśīrbhiḥ sa purodhasāṁ raṇabahādūro'viśatsvāṁ purīm || 135 ||
T13n2940u_001:418: (69) svasti śrībhadrakālī lumaḍibhagavatī svāmirājaṁ svapālyaṁ matvaivaṁ svāgatābhyudgamanasurasikevotthitā tūrṇamāsīt |
T13n2940u_001:421: kādambaiḥ patrapuṣpairvikirati pavanoddhūtaśākhāvimuktai- rlajjāpīṭhe kadambadru masurabhivane vajratuṇḍīyakṣetre |
T13n2940u_001:422: diṣṭyā bhadraṁ mameti drumagatavayasāṁ rāvatūryapraṇādai- rdevī śrībhadrakālī lumaḍibhagavatī vajratuṇḍīsametā || 137 ||
T13n2940u_001:424: (70) capprāsīsainyamadhye vilasati nibhṛtaṁ bhīmasenānuyāyī vīraśrīḥ svāmirājo bhujayugaladhṛtoccaṇḍaratnatsarūṇām |
T13n2940u_001:425: niṣkośānāmasīnāṁ rucibhirupaniṣadrūṣitānekarūpāṁ mūrti bibhratpradadhyāvajananikṛtapūrvāṁ natiṁ bhadrakālyāḥ || 138 ||
T13n2940u_001:427: ekāgrīkṛtya cittaṁ jalaśayanagataṁ viṣṇumudbodhya vedhā astāvīd yoganidrāṁ madhumukhamasuraṁ caṇḍamuṇdau ca hantum |
T13n2940u_001:428: hantuṁ pratyagramanyuṁ mahiṣamatha sasainyaṁ yatha manyuveśā- cchrīsvāmī yogirājo lumuḍibhagavatīstotrakṛt stauti hā smā || 139 ||
T13n2940u_001:432: svastiśrībhadrakālī lumuḍibhagavatī vajratuṇḍī viśālā brāhmyādyā mātaroṣṭau bhavaduritaharā āstha yūyaṁ kṛtajñāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:433: nepāle puṇyabhūmau nivasatha bhagavatparṣadāṁ sevakohaṁ maryādīkṛtya tanme prakṛtibhavabhayaṁ mocayantu prasannāḥ || 140 ||
T13n2940u_001:435: saṅkaṣṭotpātahantrī bhagavati bhavatī tāriṇī saṅkaṭākhyā āmnāyeṣvapyagamyā prakṛtiṣu vidhurā nāmabhedaikagamyā |
T13n2940u_001:436: padmasthā padmahastā'ntakaturagakaśā durgahā'riṣṭahantrī nepāleśī pumān strī tvamasi kṛtakalidvāparatretayā yuk || 141 ||
T13n2940u_001:438: tvaṁ devī vajratuṇḍī tvadadhikṛtiriyaṁ bhūmiretarhi tuṇḍī- kṣetraṁ lajjopapīṭhaṁ janayati viduṣāṁ dhīṣu lajjāṁ kukṛtye |
T13n2940u_001:439: (72) siddhairānītakūṭaṁ himaśikharibhavaṁ tvatkṛte hyoṣadhīnāṁ tasmāttvāṁ vaidyarājñīṁ prakṛtibhavarujāṁ naumi mūrdhnā natena || 142 ||
T13n2940u_001:441: śrītuṇḍībhairavastvaṁ karakalitakapālaḥ kirīṭī ca daṇḍī tvatpādābjaprasādādatisukhamanubhūtaṁ purā rallamallaiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:442: adyāpi tvaṁ mahākāla saphalayati nididhyāsanāṁ putrarājye yasmādakṣobhyamūrtiḥ kṣapayatu duritaṁ tvaṁ gatistvaṁ matirme || 143 ||
T13n2940u_001:444: brahmāṇīṁ kanakāvadātavadanāṁ cakrāṅgapṛṣṭhasthitāṁ seve pustakamakṣasūtrakarakā'bhītīrdadhānāṁ karaiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:445: cañcatkuṇḍalamaṇḍitāṁ pravilasatsarvāṅgabhūṣojjvalāṁ brahmajñānasamādhigamyaviṣayāṁ brahmāṇi no rakṣatu || 144 ||
T13n2940u_001:448: sṛṣṭyantasthitihetubhūtaniśitaṁ dhatte triśūlaṁ karai- strailokyotkaṭanādanādiḍamaruṁ parśu tathā pāśakam || 145 ||
T13n2940u_001:450: śrīkaumāri japāprasūnarudhirābhāse paritrāhi māṁ bhūyobhirviṣayograpannagaviṣairāghūrṇitaṁ durbhagam |
T13n2940u_001:451: yā reje śṛṇipāśamaṇḍitakarā śaktidhvajau bibhratī vairivrātavidāraṇaikakuśalā māyūrayānasthitā || 146 ||
T13n2940u_001:453: śrīviṣṇormahilāṁ dadhāmi manasā tārkṣyaṅgamāṁ trīkṣaṇāṁ yā dhatte'rigade ca śaṅkhacaṣakau dūrvādalaśyāmalā |
T13n2940u_001:454: bhaktyudrekajanānuvatsala asanmārgapratidhvaṁsike bhaktānandakari bhavāni taralaṁ saṁsārapāraṁ naya || 147 ||
T13n2940u_001:456: (74) śrīndrāṇī kuliśadhvajāṅkitakarā stamberamādhyāsinī dhatte yā'tapava raṇaṁ śṛṇivaraṁ kausumbharāgacchaviḥ |
T13n2940u_001:457: seyaṁ puṣkalabhaktimuktiphaladā śambho bhavatvambikā kṣantavyo'sakṛdeva manturapi me dehi tvadaṅghyrālayam || 148 ||
T13n2940u_001:459: vārāhīṁ ghanaghorakālavadanāṁ daṁṣṭroddhṛtakṣmātallā seve sairibhavāhanāṁ paṭuravāṁ khaḍgāṅkuśau bibhratīm |
T13n2940u_001:460: dhatte yogramulūkhalaṁ ca muśalaṁ dorbhiścaturbhiryutā pāyānmāṁ vikasāruṇā śikhiśikhāpiṅgorddhvakeśāmbikā || 149 ||
T13n2940u_001:462: śrīkālī kālarātrī kavalitacaṣakā kālavṛndābhakāyā kaṁkālī kālakarṇī sthapuṭagataśirā muṇḍamālākulāṅgī |
T13n2940u_001:463: yā dhatte'siṁ triśūlaṁ kuṇapahṛdi gatā pretabhūmau raṭantī pāyātkālaughakālī phalakayutakarā kāṁdiśīkaṁ śaraṇyam || 150 ||
T13n2940u_001:469: vetālorasi saṁraṭantamasicarmāṅka sudhāṁśucchaṭā- cūḍaṁ trīkṣaṇamūrddhvabarbarakacaṁ seve mahābhairavam || 152 |
T13n2940u_001:471: tuṣṭāsvaṣṭasu mātṛkāsu bhavatīṣvaṣṭau mahāsiddhayo ruṣṭāsvaṣṭasu mātṛkābhagavatīṣvaṣṭau mahābhītayaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:472: ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti caivamurarīkurvanti gṛhṇanti vā teṣāṁ gītamidaṁ bhaveccirataraṁ śrīsiddhibuddhipradam || 153 ||
T13n2940u_001:474: (76) ityaṣṭau mātṛkāḥ śrīlumuḍi bhagavati śrīmahākālavīra devi śrīvajratuṇḍi prakṛtibhayahare saṁkaṭe kaṣṭahantri |
T13n2940u_001:475: devi pratyaṅgire he bhagavati parakṛtyāvināśaikadakṣe mā me vijñaptimetarhi kuruta ghuṇavarṇaikalakṣāṁ namo vaḥ || 154 ||
T13n2940u_001:477: sasacivabalavarge svasti gīrvāṇayuddhe diśata sakalasiddhiṁ śrīmahārājarāje |
T13n2940u_001:478: manasi ca parituṣṭe ko'rthavān ko daridra iti bhagavati mātaḥ prārthaye bhaktimekām || 155 ||
T13n2940u_001:492: tuṣṭā śrībhadrakālī lumuḍibhagavatī vajratuṇḍī viśālā śāntā pratyaṅgirā'kṣobhyamunikṛtaśirasko mahākālavīraḥ |
T13n2940u_001:493: hāhāhuhuninādairviyati ghanaghaṭāgarjitairdurdinotthaiḥ svaṁ svaṁ naisargarūpaṁ danujakulavadhe svāmine yattadā'dāt || 160 ||
T13n2940u_001:495: dattaṁ saṁbhūya devībhirarikulavadhūbṛndavaidhavyadakṣaṁ rūpaṁ cāstraṁ ca labdhvā nṛpatiraṇabahādūrasāhaḥ pratāpī |
T13n2940u_001:496: doṣṇāṁ cākṣṇāṁ sahasraṁ dadhadiva kṛtavīryātmajanmeva śakra- śchettā bhettā ripūṇāmapi balisadanādhyāśritānāṁ babhūva || 161 ||
T13n2940u_001:498: saudheṣu pramadāpramodhabhaṇite ṣvārabdhagītotsave- ṣvāvikṣyan raṇabāhadūranṛpatiryadgopuraṁ prākramat |
T13n2940u_001:499: (78) bhūyobhiḥ puravāsinetrajanitaiharṣāśrubhiḥ sākṣatai- rgandhaiḥ kṣemakutūhalaplutamukhairbhadrāśiṣā saṁgataḥ || 162 ||
T13n2940u_001:501: saudhaṁ prāpya jitaśramo raṇabahāduropi sāmarṣaṇaḥ puṁratnānanapaṁkajaṁ sulalitaṁ jighran samāśvāsakaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:502: devīṁ ca tripureśvarīṁ bhagavatīṁ pādābjasaṁvāhinīṁ dṛṣṭvā manyumamūmucacca kanakāvatyutkramotthaṁ tvarā || 163 ||
T13n2940u_001:504: devi priye bhāmini cāruśīle diṣṭyā'bhivarddhasva dharātalesmin |
T13n2940u_001:507: (79) kauśalyeva dharāvaterdaśarathasyārundhatīvad vasi- ṣṭhasyarṣeriva jānakī raghupatermeneva śaileśituḥ |
T13n2940u_001:508: svāheva jvalanasya śūlina iva śrīviṣṇubhaktiḥ priyā devī sā tripureśvarī raṇabahādūraṁ vyajijñāpayat || 165 ||
T13n2940u_001:511: kāśyāṁ vihṛtya saphalīkṛtamadya janma kṣātraṁ namo bhagavate'mitavikramāya || 166 ||
T13n2940u_001:513: kroḍīkṛtya sutaṁ tato viruruce gīrvāṇayuddhaṁ nṛpaṁ śrīsvāmī giriśo yathā gaṇapatiṁ pratyarthidāvānalaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:514: (80) mūlaṁ nirdahadeva kāṇḍamavitā puṣpaṁ phalaṁ bṛṁhaya- nnāhosvinnikaṭe phalāyitatarurdūreṇa santāpadaḥ || 167 ||
T13n2940u_001:517: gorakṣācalanāyakasya nṛpateḥ sannītinirṇāyakān rāṇākhyānatha boharānapi samānāyyākaronnirṇayam || 168 ||
T13n2940u_001:519: ye kecid vyabhicāriṇaḥ prakṛtiṣu svāmipravāsaṁ bahū- kṛtvā mārganirodhinaḥ pratidiśaṁ ye kūṭasaṁcāriṇaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:520: enobhirbahujanmajaiḥ pariṇatā viṇmūtrapūyākule te cāsaṁskṛtatantubaddhakaṭayo'majjan durantāgasi || 169 ||
T13n2940u_001:522: (81) cakraṁ nirmāya kāṣṭhodbhavamatha balavad yugyayantrālinaddhaṁ grīvāsajjaṁ babandha prakṛtiṣu vidhurasyātyaho'runtudaṁ yat |
T13n2940u_001:523: yasyaikasyāpi vāhadviṣata iva śirodhau hi nistriṁśadhārā- pātaprāyaṁ yathā syādahaha raṇabahādūrasāhapratīpāt || 170 ||
T13n2940u_001:525: yā kācit pūtanābhā prakṛtiṣu vidhurā pānakaumārikākhyā kāśīsthaṁ svāmirājaṁ vijanamuparaṭantaṁ bahu manyamānā sārddhaṁ putreṇa vandīkṛtanijapariṣa dgardabhaṁ vāhayānā prāleyādreḥ sutevolvaṇatapa acarattadgireḥ prasthadeśe || 171 ||
T13n2940u_001:527: (82) yāstāḥ śūrpaṇakhīkṛtā raṇabahādūreṇa dauvārikāḥ śrīrāmeṇa niśācarīva sahasā cotkṛtta nāsākacāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:528: mūrdhnā sarjarasapradīpamadaghātsvāgonurūpaṁ tvarā drohī śaṅkhadharo nayotpathagataśce ṭīprapañcānugaḥ || 172 ||
T13n2940u_001:530: evaṁ ye ya upadrutā raṇabahādūraṁ prati drohiṇa- ste sarve'pyabhavan drutaṁ hyatithayo vaivasvatasyālaye |
T13n2940u_001:531: ityaṁ śrīraṇabāhadūranṛpatiḥ saṁmardayitvā dviṣo bhīmāyādiśati sma śāśvatapadaṁ prasthāpayan kāśikān || 173 ||
T13n2940u_001:533: adyārabhya madaṁśamarddhamapi te dattaṁ mayā satpadaṁ maddharmārddhatanurmadīyacaraṇadhyānaikatāno yataḥ |
T13n2940u_001:534: śrīgīrvāṇamahīpatermama sutasyākhaṇḍarāṣṭreṣu bho mantrivyūhaśiromaṇirnṛpahitastvaṁ bhīmasenaḥ kṛtī || 174 ||
T13n2940u_001:536: (83) śrīgīrvāṇamahīpatīndratilakāllabdhaprasādādhikaḥ śrīsvāmī raṇabāhadūra raghupo laṅkāṁ yathā rakṣase |
T13n2940u_001:537: kampūnāmasainyasaṁhatimatho saṁvyūhayitvā haṭhā- dakṣauhiṇyupamāṁ samarpayati yattadbhīmasenāya ha || 175 ||
T13n2940u_001:539: mudrāṇāṁ pātanenā'sakṛdasakṛdabhūddhiṁgulānāṁ mahargha- stattallekhyānukūlākṣaratatilikhane kāgadānāṁ maṣīṇām |
T13n2940u_001:540: tattatpatreṣu mārphatsamabhidhalikhane khedatā nāsya jātā jīyānmantrīśathāpākulamaṇiraniśaṁ bhīmaseno yaśasvī || 176 ||
T13n2940u_001:542: (84) na śāstradṛṣṭyā viduṣā nṛpeṇa vollaṅghanīyāḥ kuladeśadharmāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:545: pūrvaṁ śrīsvāminā ye viluṭhitamahaso lopitārcā maheśā hārītīśītalādyā digutalitulajābhairavakṣetrapālāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:546: te sarve bhīmasenasya hi sacivamaṇeryuktinītiprayogāt svāṁ svāmarcāmavāpurnṛpatiraṇabahādūravākyāhitārcāḥ || 178 ||
T13n2940u_001:548: (85) ye bhūpāḥ śakrakalpāḥ pramathitapratipakṣā mahotsāhabhājo yeṣāṁ jñānottamānāmapi sacivakulaṁ supratispaddhijīvam |
T13n2940u_001:549: tepyājñālekhyabhūmiṁ druhiṇanarapateḥ śrīhariścandrarājā yadvatsaṁsaktakarmāvalimiha na jahatyatra no citrametat || 179 ||
T13n2940u_001:551: (86) abdhinullaṁdhayanti pratidiśamanuyāntyāruhantyadrikūṭān kāntārāṇyāviśanti kṣititalamanugacchanti karmāṇi nūnam |
T13n2940u_001:552: pātālaṁ cāviśantyūrmaya iva payasāṁ prāktanānāṁ ca yeṣāṁ yāvadbhuktarna lokābhyanugamanavidhau mārgaroddhā na kaścit || 180 ||
T13n2940u_001:554: sā dīrghā karmavallī satatamabhinavā yā purāṇaiḥ phalaughai- rvyāptā sāścaryarūpā satatamanugatā dehināṁ niścalā ca |
T13n2940u_001:555: yā cākṛṣṭopaviṣṭā tadanu vighaṭitotpāṭitā moṭitā vā naikaiḥ puṇyaiḥ susūkṣmaṁ kaṇaśa api kṛtā naiva yāti kṣayaṁ yā || 181 ||
T13n2940u_001:557: kānte kāye yadindurvahati ca malinaṁ doṣavimbaṁ garīyaḥ krurākāro bhujaṅgaḥ kiraṇasujaṭilaṁ yanmaṇiṁ kṛṣṇasarpaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:558: nānārūpaiśca kirmīracaritamaniśaṁ bhūbhṛtāṁ darśayantī seyaṁ citrakramālīpariṇatibahulā karmanirmāṇarekhā || 182 ||
T13n2940u_001:563: tribhuvanabhuvanodareṣu bhāvī phalati hi jantuṣu karmaṇāṁ vipākaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:564: kva ca nṛparaṇabāhadūrasāhaḥ kva ca sahajāhitaserabāhadūraḥ || 184 ||
T13n2940u_001:566: snāyī gāṅgeṣu vārṣu kṣitiparaṇabahādurasāhaḥ sahāṅgaṁ śrīmadgīrvāṇayuddhaṁ prakṛtiṣu sarale bhīmasene'rpayitvā |
T13n2940u_001:567: dvandvatītaṁ prapede padamamalamalaṁ svāśrayasyopariṣṭāt svāmyājñāṁ pālayitvā jayati nṛpahito bhīmaseno yaśasvī || 185 ||
T13n2940u_001:570: dāmnaikenānītavanto niṣādai- rullūnāste karmaṇe vai namo'stu || 186 ||
T13n2940u_001:572: śrīsvāmidrohiṇo ye dharaṇipaparicaryāpratīpāḥ parokṣā ullūnāste viluṇṭhadvibhavaparijanāḥ pulkaśānītatīrthāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:575: (89) rājñī śrīrājyalakṣmīḥ kaṭaharavipinātprākkramitvaiva pūrvaṁ diṣṭyā lāmāgurūṇāṁ paricaraṇavaśādakṣamālāṁ japantī |
T13n2940u_001:576: prāleyādreḥ sutevoparigaganatalātprākkramitvā hiraṁbu- sthānādanvagyayau śrīpaśupa raṇabahādūramāsaptamāhāt || 188 ||
T13n2940u_001:578: gulmī janmasthalaṁ tatpatirapi janakaḥ kṣātradharmeṣu gaṇyo yasyā bhartā ca gorṣāpatiṣu parivṛḍho mallajetuśca naptā |
T13n2940u_001:579: nāmnā śrīrājyalakṣmīḥ kaṭaharavipinaṁ prāpya kāśīmagatvā anvārohaccitāṁ śrīkṣitiparaṇabahādūramāsaptamāhāt || 189 ||
T13n2940u_001:581: (90) itthaṁ śrīraṇabāhadūraciritaṁ saṁkṣipya saṁvarṇitaṁ ye śṛṇvantyavadhārayanti mahasā gorakṣabhūpādbhutam |
T13n2940u_001:586: nūvākoṭavihāriṇātha mṛgayālubdhena tuṣṭena vai sarvaṁ bhīmamayaṁ jagatkṛtavatā gīrvāṇayuddhena yā |
T13n2940u_001:587: vīrāṇāmapi bhītidā janaraletyākhyā kṛtvā tasya yā sa pratyagramajāgarītkṣititale pratyekatajaḥpradā || 191 ||
T13n2940u_001:596: kṛtārthatāṁ vedayatīva tasya siṁho hanūmānapi pānthamavyāt || 194 ||
T13n2940u_001:613: pataṅgamullocayadāsa bhūpo gīrvāṇayuddhaḥ sa ca bhīmasenaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:614: svatantunā kalkavilepitena pauraṁ pataṅgaṁ gaganād babādhe || 200 ||
T13n2940u_001:617: vinodayan dattadhanaḥ svagehaṁ prasthāpayāmāsa nṛpaḥ sa dhanyaḥ || 201 ||
T13n2940u_001:620: (94) sthitvā tuljālaye śrītalijusamabhidhe bhīmasenena sārddhaṁ thāpāratnena tantugrahaṇapaṭudhiyā lakṣadṛṣṭyā nipītaḥ || 202 ||
T13n2940u_001:622: śrīmadgīrvāṇayuddhāgrimanṛpatiyaśaḥkṣīradhau koṭanāmā ḍiṇḍīraḥ prādurāsīddhanumata anubhāvād yathā bhīmayatnāt |
T13n2940u_001:623: mainākaḥ pakṣarakṣāpara iva dharaṇīpālamallapratīpād dhvaṁsībhūtaḥ purā śrīnṛpatiraṇabahādūrajaḥ sa sma dhanyaḥ || 203 ||
T13n2940u_001:625: śrīgīrvāṇamahīpatirjanaralaḥ śrībhīmasenaśca tau jāgratsvapnasuṣuptiṣu pratipadaṁ prītau jaratkāruvat |
T13n2940u_001:626: śrīrājendramahīpatiṁ svatanujaṁ vinyasya tasyādare śakraṁ jetumiyādabhartyabhavanaṁ yacchītalānoditaḥ || 204 ||
T13n2940u_001:629: śāke'gnyadryaṣṭarūpe paśupaticaraṇoddhū tadhūlīvitānai rallairmallaiḥ pratiṣṭhīkṛtanṛpasadane vaijayantīṁ cakāra || 205 ||
T13n2940u_001:631: kṛṣṇaṁ yaśodeva rarakṣa yeyaṁ rājendrasāhaṁ kṣitipālaratnam |
T13n2940u_001:632: seyaṁ trivargaprakṛtiḥ sudhanyā lalit-tripur-sundarikā sma reje || 206 ||
T13n2940u_001:634: dhanyā śrīśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā svargāvatīrṇā śacī devīva tripureśvarī vasumatī devī varīvarti sā |
T13n2940u_001:635: (96) seyaṁ śrītripureśvaraṁ raṇabahādūraprakṛtyā'rabhat tīrthe puṇyatame saniṣkuṭamahāprāsādasatrālayam || 207 ||
T13n2940u_001:637: hāhāhūhupurogamāśca vasavaḥ kāṣṭhādhipāśceṣṭadā viśvedevapurogamāśca tuṣitā ābhāsvarāḥ sānilāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:638: sarve dasrapurogamāśca saha taiḥ śrīviśvakarmā'cirā- cchrīmatsvāmyupaveśanārthamagamat prāsādasaṁsiddhaye || 208 ||
T13n2940u_001:640: evaṁ śrītripureśvarī bhagavatī nirmāpayitvādarād devāgāramupaskareṇa sahitaṁ ghaṇṭātriśūlādibhiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:641: tīrthaṁ kālavimocanābhidhamadhi prapyārpayacchūline khyāto'stu tripureśvaro'yamavanau durbhikṣakaṣṭādihā || 209 ||
T13n2940u_001:644: purāṇāntare dhyāyennityaṁ maheśaṁ rajatagirinibhaṁ cārucandrāvataṁsaṁ ratnākalpojjvalāṅgaṁ paraśumṛgavarābhītihastaṁ prasannam |
T13n2940u_001:645: padmāsīnaṁ samantātstutamamaragaṇairvyāghrakṛttiṁ vasānaṁ viśvādyaṁ viśvadandyaṁ nikhilabhayaharaṁ pañcavaktraṁ trinetram || 210 ||
T13n2940u_001:647: kīṭairjuṣṭamamedhyabhūpariṇataṁ vastrāñcalasparśi yat paryuṣṭaṁ gaṇarātramāgamaniṣiddhaṁ puṣpamapyarpitam |
T13n2940u_001:648: no jāne bhavadīyasevanavidhiṁ prāmādikaṁ kevalaṁ bhūyastvena kṛpālunā bhagavatā kṣantavyamāgo mama || 211 ||
T13n2940u_001:650: yaddattaṁ bhaktipūrvaṁ kusumaphalajalaṁ gandhavastropavītaṁ dīpaṁ naivedyamannaṁ punarapi madhuparkaṁ punaḥ pādyamardhyam |
T13n2940u_001:651: mantreṇonādhikārṇena ca japitamaho cetasā tāmasena tannyūnādhikyadoṣaṁ mama hara sakalaṁ tubhyamevārpayāmi || 212 ||
T13n2940u_001:653: (98) dhyāyan dhyāyan dharaṇipamahaṁ cetasā nirmameṇa pāyan pāyan caraṇajasudhāṁ karmaṇā sādareṇa |
T13n2940u_001:654: smāran smāran sunṛtamanasā bhūtapaṁ sāhadevaṁ bhūyo bhūyo hṛdayakamale bhāvaye'haṁ bhavantam || 213 ||
T13n2940u_001:656: tvamasi bhavapāvako mama kaluṣadāhakaḥ pramathagaṇanāyako bhavajaladhitārakaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:660: avatu bhavadarbhakaṁ dharaṇipatibālakaṁ suciratarajīvakaṁ haratu tadariṣṭakam || 215 ||
T13n2940u_001:662: etādṛṅmukhavādyavādanaparā hṛṣṭā pragalbhā satī āyuḥprārthanayā cirāya nṛpate rājendrarājeśituḥ |
T13n2940u_001:665: evaṁ śrītripureśvaraṁ smarati yaḥ stoṣyatyanuṣṭhīyate rājāmātyapurodhasāṁ hitataraḥ saṁjāyate niścitam |
T13n2940u_001:666: stotuḥ śrotururīkṛtasya paṭhataḥ pratyūhadāvānalaṁ rājño'gneḥ paripanthino'pyapamṛteścorācca na syādbhayam || 217 ||
T13n2940u_001:670: dadau sadāśīrvacanaṁ ca rājñe tattraipuraṁ satramiyācca sthairyam || 218 ||
T13n2940u_001:672: vṛddhāstapobhirvayasā ca vṛddhā jñānena vṛddhā nyavasaṁśca hṛṣṭāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:675: tilottamorvaśī sukeśinī ca mañjughoṣayā ghṛtācikā ca menikā sarambhayā sahāpsarāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:676: divāniśaṁ ca gīyate yaśastadīyamadbhutaṁ naṭī bhaṭī surūpiṇī svahastadattatālikā || 220 ||
T13n2940u_001:678: (101) rammāstambhadidhakṣuragniriva yaḥ kṣiptaḥ pradīpo'mbhisi prāleyāṁśurivābhrajālapihitaḥ sūryaḥ śucau durdine |
T13n2940u_001:679: gāṅgeyasya śareṇa pīḍitatanuḥ seneva yaudhiṣṭhirī buddhiḥ sundaranandajā kṣatimagād dāridryatāpolvaṇāt || 221 ||
T13n2940u_001:686: (102) yasyāścitrāṇi dhāmānyabhijanapaṭhitastotraramyāṇi hṛdyā- nyārāmāṇi praphullairviṭapibhirabhito vāpikāpalvalaiśca |
T13n2940u_001:687: godhāmatsyodrakūrmakṣubhitajalataraṅgaiśca padmotpalāḍhyai reje kāntīpurīyaṁ kimu suranagarī svardhunī nandanaṁ vā || 223 ||
T13n2940u_001:689: yasyāṁ rambhāsadṛkṣaiḥ sarasapaṭutarai rāgiṇīnāṁ samakṣai- rgītajñānāṁ mṛdaṅgadhvanininadasamāhūtadivyāṅganānām |
T13n2940u_001:690: hāhāhūhūsutālaiḥ sataralacakitaṁ śrīyaśo gīyamānaṁ śrutvā dvāḥstho hanūmān naṭati vijayate dvāḥsthitaḥ śrīhanūmān || 224 ||
T13n2940u_001:693: devyāḥ kāśīva kālyā vilasati nitarāṁ śvetakālyāḥ pretolī ṅetākhyā kāśivāsiddhvijamithunabhiṣagbhaṭṭavāstavyamiśrāḥ || 225 ||
T13n2940u_001:695: (104) devī kāśyannapūrṇeva vilasati asantolikā yā'lakaiva paulastyasyannāpatrauṣadhivividharasaiścoṣyalehyaiśca peyaiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:702: nityaṁ devasabhā tathāridalane vīrā sudharmopamā kāmye kānyasabhā suśāntasamaye śrīdharmarājī sabhā |
T13n2940u_001:703: vīraiḥ paṇḍitatarkaśāstrakavibhirvyāpūritā sā sabhā śrīrājendramahīpatervijayate śrībhīmasenānvitā || 228 ||
T13n2940u_001:708: (106) mānī jñānī dhanī yaḥ parapuraharaṇe skandavaddarpadarpaḥ śrīmān rāmān sa mānnyaḥ sa hi mahimahilaścaṇḍakāṇḍaḥ paḍaṅgaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:709: jīyātpāyāddayāvānavanivaravadhūpālane labdhalakṣmā mūkaṁ lokaṁ sakampaṁ guṇagaṇagaṇanāpārago raṅgaraktaḥ || 230 ||
T13n2940u_001:711: bhītirnaśyati rājarājavijite gīrvāṇabhūmau yathā martyāḥ santi nirākulā na jananī tato'tyajatsatkṛpām |
T13n2940u_001:712: (107) sevārthaṁ munayo'pi dūrayamunātīrāttapasyotsukāḥ nandanti tripureśvarairlasadaho kṣetraṁ sadharmadhvaji || 231 ||
T13n2940u_001:714: yadgopurāntakagatā vanitā babhāṣe saṁmīlya yūthaśa apatyamukhāravindam |
T13n2940u_001:715: unnāmya paśyasi gajopari rājarājaṁ dāridryatāpaśabhane jaladāyamānam || 232 ||
T13n2940u_001:720: (108) rājā'yaṁ janatāsu meghasadṛśo vaktuṁ na śakyo mayā megho varṣati cātakasya samaye'sau sarvadā varṣati |
T13n2940u_001:721: megho varṣati cāmbha eva vipulaṁ yo hemaratnāmbaraṁ meghaḥ syāmamukhaḥ pradānasamaye yo hemagaurānanaḥ || 234 ||
T13n2940u_001:723: (109) rājā dhojā bajār-yā sahaja hariharaṁ devatāvargavarlāk mānī jñānī dhanī hāy parapuraharaṇe chākagū kaṇṭakaṁ khaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:724: śrīrājā rājarājendra juju juga jugaṁ āyu lāyu thva yuktī kājī sājī sajīlā madu madu madu ek he dhanī dhanya dhanye || 235 ||
T13n2940u_001:726: diṣṭyā'bhivarddhatuśataṁ śarado nṛpendro yadvacca sundaraprasāda ibhendraratnam |
T13n2940u_001:729: (110) jyotirvidāṁ nigamakalpita eṣa panthāḥ ṣaṣṭirdvinidhnaśaradāyuribhasya nuśca |
T13n2940u_001:730: āyustadasya nṛpaterapi rājarāje- ndrasyāstu bho mitha abhāṣata dṛṣṭabhūpaḥ || 237 ||
T13n2940u_001:733: śrīmān rājendrasāho nṛpakulatikalo'śītivasvindutulye śrīpañcamyāṁ ca jīve nigamanigaditairudvavāhe vidhānaiḥ || 238 ||
T13n2940u_001:735: (111) ḍhakkādyāṇakavādyavādanaparāstauryatrikā gāyakā veṇudhmāḥ karatālikāḥ suvacaso gāndharvikā nāṭakāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:738: diṣṭyā tvayā sa bhagavān nṛpatirmayāpi dṛṣṭaḥ pureva nṛpapṛthvinarāyaṇo'yam |
T13n2940u_001:739: itthaṁ mithaḥ prabhaṇitaṁ muditairaśīti- varṣottaraiḥ sapalitaiḥ skhaladakṣaraughaiḥ || 240 ||
T13n2940u_001:742: (112) varṇena puṣkaratayā vapuṣā ca tulyo diṣṭyādya tatsutasutātmaja eṣa rājā || 241 ||
T13n2940u_001:744: naivā'paśyaṁ hi gīrvāṇayudhanṛpamahaṁ śītalāyāḥ pratīpā- dābālaṁ tāmrakośīgahanamupagato bhrātṛvargeṇa sākam |
T13n2940u_001:745: śrutvā yatkīrtimārādahaha dhṛtiharo nindamāno'smi bhāgyaṁ diṣṭyā paśyāmi tatsūnumamumavanipaṁ rājarājendrasāham || 242 ||
T13n2940u_001:747: dhanyā'raṇyānyagamyā ṭhigaṇasamabhidhā vekravallīvitānā yatrāsan śītalātīḥ śataśa atitarāṁ śītalālhāditāyām |
T13n2940u_001:748: pratyāvṛtyāhamasyāḥ sa ca sa ca sasakhaḥ svasti gīrvāṇayuddhaṁ diṣṭyā paśyāmi dīnānanu janitakṛpaṁ dravyavṛṣṭyāramantam || 243 ||
T13n2940u_001:751: yoginyā aniśaṁ ca sevanavaśāt tatpūjakenaiva ya- nnaivedyaṁ mama dīyate pratidinaṁ tenaiva jīvāmyaham || 244 ||
T13n2940u_001:753: śrīsaṁvadyugahastihastividhuge āṣāḍhaśukle budhe śrīgaurīsutithau nṛpaḥ paśupateḥ sandarśanāthaṁ gataḥ |
T13n2940u_001:754: dṛṣṭo me vasuvṛṣṭibhirbudhajanaiḥ prastūyamānaḥ śanai- rnāgaṁ hāṭakasaṁbhavaṁ maṇigaṇaiścitraṁ śivāyārpayat || 245 ||
T13n2940u_001:756: (114) sākṣānnārāyaṇāṁśaḥ paśupaticaraṇoddhūtadhūlīvitānaḥ śrīmān rājendrasāhaḥ sapadi viruruce labdhabhargaikyabhāvaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:757: nāste nārāyaṇacca parama atita.. prītipātraṁ paśūnāṁ patyuḥ saṁbhūya tau dvau paśupatinṛpatī rakṣato bhūrbhuvaḥsvaḥ || 246 ||
T13n2940u_001:759: jyeṣṭhe māsyasite dale haritithau saṁvat ṣaḍaṣṭāṣṭabhū- yāte kāvyadine mudā vijayate bhaktāabhidhaṁ pattanam |
T13n2940u_001:760: śrīrājendramahīpatiḥ purabhavaiḥ svastyāśiṣā nanditaḥ saubhikṣaṁ janatā jagāda nṛpateḥ prodyatpratāpārciṣā || 247 ||
T13n2940u_001:762: (115) sthānādgaṇeśiturupākramato nṛpasyā- ṣāḍhe kuhūyuji kuje'nhi babhūva śobhā |
T13n2940u_001:765: lokairitastata iti dravitaṁ nu panthāḥ ko vā bhaviṣyati mahīpasamāgamāya |
T13n2940u_001:766: nirgacchate punaramātyavareṇa sāka- mutkaṇṭhayeti pratigopuramīkṣate sma || 249 ||
T13n2940u_001:768: prācyāmairāvatākhyaṁ diśi vidiśi babandhurdigīśāḥ karīndrā- nāgneyyāṁ puṇḍarīkaṁ kramaśa iti gajaṁ vāmanaṁ kaumudaṁ ca |
T13n2940u_001:772: (116) duḥśālāṁ hastiśālāṁ śithilagajaghaṭāṁ jīryamāṇāṁ viditvā nūtnāṁ prācyāmavācyāmatha vidiśi manohāriṇīṁ stambhanaddhām |
T13n2940u_001:773: kṛtvā lakṣmīprasādaṁ gajahavaḍaprasādaṁ ca devīprasādaṁ krudhyanmotiprasādaṁ tadupari ca jaharveṣasajñaṁ babandha || 251 ||
T13n2940u_001:775: (117) nāgā'sāvamaraprasāda iti yaḥ saundaryavīryodayai- rdevendrebhasamaḥ suśikṣitaguṇaḥ saubhāgyaratnākaraḥ |
T13n2940u_001:776: yaddantopari viṣṭarāsanavare sthitvā japādikriyā- kartuḥ satpuruṣārthado vijayate bhūpālacūḍāmaṇeḥ || 252 ||
T13n2940u_001:778: mattebhendraikadantaḥ sa jayati nṛpatervīralakṣmīprasādo hṛṣṭāṅgo lakṣaṇaudhairnigamanigaditairhastiratnaṁ garīyān |
T13n2940u_001:779: dānādhyakṣastiraścāṁ svakaravigalitaiḥ svānnapiṇḍekṣadaṇḍaiḥ poṣṭā kreṅkāravaktā suraṇitanigaḍo varṣmaṇā vindhyaśailaḥ || 253 ||
T13n2940u_001:781: (118) martyānāṁ durgrahebhyo vitarati hi vimuktiṁ haṭhādvakratuṇḍo yadbhaktyā siddhimāpustridaśamunivarā vāmadevādayaśca |
T13n2940u_001:782: pārvatyā gaṅgayā vā gaṇayata aniśaṁ ṣaḍguṇaṁ cāgryagaṇyaṁ taṁ vande caikadantaṁ gaṇapatimabhayaṁ kāryasiddhernidānam || 254 ||
T13n2940u_001:784: vīro lakṣmīprasādo madayati ca muhuḥ stambhamālambate'ho vakti kreṁ kreṁ kimārājjanaralasacivaṁ vīkṣya rājendrarājam |
T13n2940u_001:785: stambhaṁ prakramya śabdāyitanijanigaḍaḥ karṇatālaṁ dadāno rājanmāṁ jetumāyātviti gaganatalādabhrahastīti buddhyā || 255 ||
T13n2940u_001:787: (119) bhūyo bhūyaśca sasnau ghaṭagalitajale śīkaraṁ gaṇḍuṣotthaṁ projjhan prānteṣu bhuktaṁ dharaṇipatikarāt kattṛṇaṁ kuñcarāśam |
T13n2940u_001:788: bhuṅkte cāyācitānnaṁ tryuṣaṇamadhughṛtaṁ śālinīvāraśaṣpaṁ rājendraṁ vāhayāno hatimiva munirāḍ vīralakṣmīprasādaḥ || 256 ||
T13n2940u_001:790: mallendro yo durghaṭānāṁ karīṇāṁ svasti śrīmān maṅkuṇaḥ śrīprasādaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:796: śrīrājendramahīpatirvijayate śrīmaṅkuṇāṅgasthitaḥ sākṣāt pṛthvinarāyaṇaḥ prathamataḥ śrīsundarebhasthitaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:797: thāpā ambarasiṁhasūnumaṇinā śrībhīmasenena ya- śchatragrāhisukhena kāntinagare dinānukampo vibhuḥ || 259 ||
T13n2940u_001:801: (121) pṛthvīnārāyaṇena prathamamatiruṣā proṣitā kīrtinārī sāpatnyātsātiruṣṭā'dhidiśamanugatā pāṁśulevotpathasthā |
T13n2940u_001:802: sāraṇyānīṁ praviṣṭā davadahanamadhāvacchucā sā ca vātai- rnītā dhūmairdvipānāṁ kulamabhavadaraṇyānijaṁ dhūmravarṇam ||
T13n2940u_001:803: adyaitaddhastivṛnde dhavalimagajarāḍeka uccairvapuṣmān śrīmadrājendrarājaṁ sacivakulamaṇiṁ bhīmasenaṁ niṣevya |
T13n2940u_001:804: varṇaṁ svaṁ dhūmaliptaṁ kṣapayitumiva sa tryūṣaṇājātikoṣā- jyājājībhṛṣṭamattuṁ śaraṇadamagamanmātharav-siṁhasārthaḥ ||
T13n2940u_001:805: (122) no manye dṛḍhabandhanakṣatamidaṁ naivāṅkuśodghāṭanaṁ skandhārohaṇatāḍanātparibhavaṁ naivānyadeśāgamam |
T13n2940u_001:806: cintā me janayanti cetasi yathā smṛtvā svayūthaṁ vane siṁhatrāsitabhīrubhīrukarabhā yāsyanti kasyāśrayam ||
T13n2940u_001:807: yadetadativistṛtaṁ bhavatu rājarājendra bho jalasthalavanāntare viharataḥ sabhīmasya te |
T13n2940u_001:808: vinaiva karaṇaṁ kareṇuriha rūpamāsādhyate manīṣigaṇasammataṁ varadarājasūtre hitam ||
T13n2940u_001:809: karṇau naiṣa dadhāti naiṣa viṣayo vāhasya dohasya vā tṛptirnāsya mahodarasya bahubhirvaśaiḥ palālairapi |
T13n2940u_001:811: sauvaśve dharaṇīpatau kimu śacībhartā spṛhāṁ nācare- dājāneyaśatākule pavanavegoccaiḥśravāḥ kevalaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:814: utplutyotplutya vegād dharaṇipatipratāpānalajvālayeva pluṣṭāṁ nepāladhātrīmiti manasi bhavadvāhanā manyamānāḥ |
T13n2940u_001:815: smṛtvā kṣīrābdhiśainyaṁ tripuraśivamahāsnānatoyaughamiśraṁ vāgmatyambhaḥ pavitraṁ plavitumiva haṭhāttuṇḍikhelād dravanti || 261 ||
T13n2940u_001:817: hā kaṣṭaṁ kathamasya pṛṣṭhaśikhare golī samāropyate ko gṛhṇāti kaparddakairalamiti grāmyairgajo hāsyate ||
T13n2940u_001:818: (124) ūrddhvaṁ cādhaśca nītaṁ turagaparivṛḍhenā'munā vaktravimbaṁ kiṁsvijjetuṁ maghono'śvamiva gaganagaṁ tarkitaṁ vimbadṛṣṭyā |
T13n2940u_001:819: prothaṁ visphārya coccaiḥ sutaralacakitaṁ hreṣitaṁ hrāsabuddhyā rājannoḍḍīya yātyeṣa ha ha yadi niyantā sudhīrbhīmasenaḥ || 262 ||
T13n2940u_001:821: rallairmallanṛpaiḥ puraikasamaye gandharvayātrā kṛtā saivādya prativāsaraṁ ca lumuḍīśrībhadrakālīmude |
T13n2940u_001:824: mañjūṣāyāṁ prasūtidvayamatha suṣuve'raṇyavadvyāghrapatnī puṁsaḥ patnīva hṛṣyatparijananicitā ruddhavātāyanā ca |
T13n2940u_001:825: māṁsairbhakṣyaiśca peyairbalavadapaghanā santatī rakṣyamāṇā dhanyā sā kāṣṭhamaṇḍe vipaṇipariṇatā bhūmipaprītipātram || 264 ||
T13n2940u_001:827: (125) dhanyo rājendrasāho yadatulamahasaḥ sāttvikād vairabhāvaṁ muktvānyonyaṁ tiraśco hayakapikariṇo gaṇḍakāḥ sairibhāśca |
T13n2940u_001:828: sārddhaṁ vyāghreṇa yuddhāya haha visṛjatā sāmyatāmeva jagmuḥ sāṁmukhyībhūya bhīme sthitavati janatā vairabhāvaṁ kva kuryāt || 265 ||
T13n2940u_001:830: śrāvaṇyāṁ pūrṇimāyāṁ śravaṇabhṛgudine siṁhage saptasaptau śrīmatkumbheśatīrthe lalitapuri mahārājarājendrasāhaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:831: sasnau dāriṁdryatāpāya sa raṇakuśalo dravyavarṣeṇa harṣā- dāśīrbhirnandyamāno muditapurajanairdīrghakālaṁ sa jīyāt || 266 ||
T13n2940u_001:833: (126) śrāvaṇyāṁ hastaṣaṣṭhyāṁ sitadalagabudhe ṣaḍgajāṣṭādaśābde snāti śrīmatyagādhe maṇisarasi samaṁ mātṛbhī rājarājaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:834: rājarddhyā pūjito'smin vitarati maṇiliṅgeśvarastatsadṛkṣā- patyaddhirājarājāya nṛpaparibṛḍhāya kṣaradvīcihastaiḥ || 267 ||
T13n2940u_001:837: ramā koṣaṁ vāṇīmamṛtamahirājo'simanalaḥ pratāpaṁ vāhatvaṁ turagapatirindustu mukuṭam || 268 ||
T13n2940u_001:839: rājendrasya surendravikramasujanmāhaḥ sulagnaṁ yadā saṁvat ṣaḍvasuhastibhūmirabhavaddurgotsavī saptamī |
T13n2940u_001:840: dāridryārṇavaśoṣakaṁ trijagatāṁ śrīpṛthvinārāyaṇaḥ sāṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhirivānvayairavatatārāsmin mahīmaṇḍale || 269 ||
T13n2940u_001:843: meghāḥ kālasuvarṣiṇaśca taravo gucchaiḥ prasūnaiḥ phalai- rāḍhyā bhūrirasapradāśca paśavaḥ santyatra janmotsave || 270 ||
T13n2940u_001:845: gobhūhāṭakaratnadhāturajataṁ bhūyo'pi bhūyo'nvabhū- cchrīmatsiṁhapratāpasāhanṛpatau bhūmaṇḍalaṁ śāsati |
T13n2940u_001:848: yadā chaunī vṛttā kṛtaruciracitrā hariharai- rnivāstavyā bhavyā prakṛtiparisevyā ca vibudhaiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:849: hayānāṁ hreṣābhirvijitaghananirhrādapaṭubhi- stadā kailāśādreḥ paribhavati tejāṁsi mahasā || 272 ||
T13n2940u_001:851: (128) dhanādhīśo yakṣāpatirapi ca rājendranṛpate- rviditvā sadbhāvaṁ mumuca iti mānaṁ svamahasām |
T13n2940u_001:852: jitaḥ kailāso me dhavalalayanairarddhaśaśibhiḥ sakhā me caitrādyaṁ vanamupavanaiścālakapurī || 273 ||
T13n2940u_001:854: (129) pumarthaiḥ prakhyātaiścaturupanataiḥ śrīraṇabahā- duraḥ smābhūd gorṣāpatiṣu paripūrṇaḥ kṣitipatiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:855: tadanyūnāṁśena trijagati sa gīrvāṇanṛpati- stadṛddhyā pūrṇaśrīriha jagati rājendranṛpatiḥ || 274 ||
T13n2940u_001:857: (130) sattvarddhyā bhrājamāno jayati narapatiḥ śrīmahārājarāje- ndro'yaṁ saṁpālyamāno lalitatripurasundaryadhiṣṭhātṛlakṣmyā |
T13n2940u_001:858: thāpāhīreṇa bhīmena sa jaṭharakulenātigopāyiṁto'sau diṣṭyā jīvyānnarendraḥ śatamiha śaradāṁ śrīsurendreṇa sākam || 275 ||
T13n2940u_001:861: naptāraḥ pañcamāstepyaviratamavanīpālanāyāsakheda- dvandvairnirmuktacitāḥ samasukhanicitāḥ śrīsamṛddhā jayantu || 276 ||
T13n2940u_001:863: saundarye madanaḥ prasannavadano nītyā prajārañjanaḥ śatrūṇāṁ śamanaḥ khalaudhadamano gīrvāṇahṛnnandanaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:869: pañcānāṁ jagatībhṛtāṁ puruṣaratnānāṁ samuccāraṇā- jjijñāsā bahuśo'nvakāri jinajenāryeṣu bhūbhṛtsu yā |
T13n2940u_001:870: taddāridryamahārṇavaprataraṇe naukeva me jāyatāṁ svastiśrīyuvarāḍayaṁ hi śatavarṣāyurvarīvartatām || 279 ||
T13n2940u_001:872: (132) thāpāvaṁśāliratnāvaliṣu suruciraṁ hīrakaṁ bhīmasenaṁ yaṁ ca jyotsnottamāṅgaṁ tribhuvanavipaṇau sārthavāhairanardhyaṁ |
T13n2940u_001:874: (133) kadācana purāpi no kṛtayugādijād bhūpateḥ svakīyapathamutsṛjannaṭati yātrayā'nyatra yaḥ |
T13n2940u_001:877: (134) yathāgatamajīgamaddhanumadādyakaṁ dvārakaṁ sa tatra pratihārakaiḥ sapadi kāñcu kīyādibhiḥ |
T13n2940u_001:880: dvitīyayuvarājakaṁ pratilabhasva rājanniti pracaṇḍaśivabhairavo nivavṛte khagendro yathā |
T13n2940u_001:881: sarākakujapauṣamāsyaditime ca śuddhakṣaṇe dvitīyayuvarājako hyavatatāra sallakṣaṇaḥ || 282 ||
T13n2940u_001:884: yatrāste diśi rājarājasacivaḥ śrībhīmasenābhidho rājanvatyābhidhā'bhavaddigadhunā boṁkoṭaśailasthalī || 283 ||
T13n2940u_001:886: śivā rutamamūmucaṁstriṣu pureṣu śṛṅgāṭake pradīptadiśi saṁmukhāḥ sukaruṇāyamānā niśi |
T13n2940u_001:889: (135) mṛṣaughamiha nālikhaṁ hyananubhūtapūrvaṁ tathā bhaviṣyamapi yatkalau vividhapratyavāyaśruteḥ |
T13n2940u_001:890: tadeva hi kulaṁ kulaṁ nṛpatipṛthvinārāyaṇa- kṣamājalanidhau plutaṁ śuci sadā'talasparśi yat || 285 ||
